import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import CountryPicker from '../CountryPicker/CountryPicker'; const Cards = ({ data: { confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate } }) => { if (!confirmed) { return "Loading..." } return (
INFECTED : {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} NUMBER OF ACTIVE CASES : RECOVERED : REAL DATE : NUMBER OF RECOVERIES : DEATHS : REAL DATE : NUMBER OF DEATHS :
); } export default Cards;
